textPlain: Anyone using radicle for a project with external contributors?I've tried it with some of my projects and it seems promising, but I wonder what it'd be like to use it on one of my more successful projects.

"We made an effort to start paving some of the way to being able to use Radicle on Windows. The first step was taken for this, and you can now use the rad CLI on a Windows machine – without WSL."This was a long-missing piece, and it’s great to finally be closing that gap.
